mapper.sql: id, name, gender, phone, cert_no, bank_no, superior, manager, bank_name, type, date_insert, date_update, delete_mark
mapper.select: SELECT e.id,e.name,e.gender,e.phone,e.cert_no AS certNo,e.bank_no AS bankNo, e.superior AS superiorId,e2.name AS superiorName,e.manager AS managerId, e3.name AS managerName,e.bank_name AS bankName, CASE e.type WHEN 0 THEN '管理' WHEN 1 THEN '木工' WHEN 2 THEN '瓦工' WHEN 3 THEN '油工' WHEN 4 THEN '电工' WHEN 5 THEN '小工' WHEN 6 THEN '抹灰工' END AS typeName, e.type AS type,DATE_FORMAT(e.date_insert,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS dateInsert FROM employee e LEFT JOIN employee e2 ON e2.id = e.superior LEFT JOIN employee e3 ON e3.id = e.manager WHERE e.delete_mark = 0 AND e.id = ${id}
